title: Extract i18n Target
description: Extract i18n target options for Build Facade.

buildTarget.description: A builder target to extract i18n messages in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

format.description: Output format for the generated file.

outputPath.description: Path where output will be placed.

outFile.description: Name of the file to output.
